title: Postscript and Suitcase Expert Fonts and iMac Leopard
content:
We recently purchased new iMacs with Leopard. We have not been able to use our expert fonts in our font families. The fonts show up in lists within applications but we are unable to use them. Are the new Macs compatible with the Expert fonts? Has anyone had a similar experience or might know how to solve the problem? Any help would be appreciated.

 [‹ ATF Typefaces - Public Domain?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110326/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45882 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need to identify font, please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110326/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45894 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mandhtype

comments.content:
I just got started with my brand new iMac and Leopard. Copied some Quark files over, and cannot see the expert set characters either. Can anyone help?

Ange
